Player History
Drafted in 10th round, 146th overall pick, by Atlanta in 2020...
Traded from Atlanta to Philadelphia on 3/2/2020 (Going to ATL: SS Brian Whitley. Going to PHI: SS Adolfo Dinh, P Scott Davies)...
Injured on 7/27/2020 with a Strained Thigh Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Traded from Philadelphia to Detroit on 3/2/2021 (Going to DET: 3B Adolfo Dinh. Going to PHI: P Leonard Howland)...
Traded from Detroit to St. Louis (C) on 5/16/2022 (Going to DET: SS Robert Guerriero. Going to STL: LF Daniel Delee, SS Bobby Speck, 3B Adolfo Dinh, P Carl Harden)...
Injured on 7/31/2022 with a Torn Groin Muscle, out for 5 weeks...
Injured on 8/19/2023 with a Tight Shoulder, out for 1-2 weeks...
